item.title: Manipur antiAFSPA activist Irom Sharmila arrested
item.description: AntiArmed Forces Special Powers Act Afspa activist Irom Sharmila was arrested by the police in Imphal on Friday According to reports she had refused to undergo medical tests
item.itunes:subtitle: AntiArmed Forces Special Powers Act Afspa activist Irom Sharmila was arrested by the police in Imphal on Friday According to reports she had refused to undergo medical tests
item.itunes:summary: AntiArmed Forces Special Powers Act Afspa activist Irom Sharmila was arrested by the police in Imphal on Friday According to reports she had refused to undergo medical tests

item.title: Jammu Pakistan Rangers violate ceasefire again
item.description: The Pakistan Rangers targeted the Border Security Force BSF posts on the international border in RS Pura sector in Jammu on Friday morning a senior police officer told IANS in Jammu
item.itunes:subtitle: The Pakistan Rangers targeted the Border Security Force BSF posts on the international border in RS Pura sector in Jammu on Friday morning a senior police officer told IANS in Jammu
item.itunes:summary: The Pakistan Rangers targeted the Border Security Force BSF posts on the international border in RS Pura sector in Jammu on Friday morning a senior police officer told IANS in Jammu

item.title: Modi presents Jharkhand with promises projects
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi appeared somewhat of a wishgranting tree on Thursday promising Jharkhand a bouquet of industrial and educational projects including a branch of a premier IT institution and many engineering colleges
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi appeared somewhat of a wishgranting tree on Thursday promising Jharkhand a bouquet of industrial and educational projects including a branch of a premier IT institution and many engineering colleges
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi appeared somewhat of a wishgranting tree on Thursday promising Jharkhand a bouquet of industrial and educational projects including a branch of a premier IT institution and many engineering colleges

item.title: Chavans decision to skip PMs function unfortunate BJP
item.description: The BJP in Maharashtra on Thursday termed as unfortunate chief minister Prithviraj Chavans decision to boycott Prime Minister Narendra Modis programme in Nagpur and said Congress should introspect why people are unhappy with the state leadership
item.itunes:subtitle: The BJP in Maharashtra on Thursday termed as unfortunate chief minister Prithviraj Chavans decision to boycott Prime Minister Narendra Modis programme in Nagpur and said Congress should introspect why people are unhappy with the state leadership
item.itunes:summary: The BJP in Maharashtra on Thursday termed as unfortunate chief minister Prithviraj Chavans decision to boycott Prime Minister Narendra Modis programme in Nagpur and said Congress should introspect why people are unhappy with the state leadership

item.title: Drunkest state Kerala going off booze to be fully dry in 10 years
item.description: The Congressled United Democratic Front government on Thursday announced a number of steps to reduce liquor consumption in Kerala which is the highest in the country and enforce total prohibition in a staggered manner

item.title: Two Indians plead guilty to massive health care fraud in US
item.description: Two Indian pharmacists working in the US have pleaded guilty to a massive health care fraud causing a loss of up to 7 million to the district of Maryland

item.title: Hearing of Asarams bail plea adjourned to September 3
item.description: The Gujarat high court adjourned on Thursday the hearing of controversial godman Asarams bail application in connection with the rape case against him to September 3
item.itunes:subtitle: The Gujarat high court adjourned on Thursday the hearing of controversial godman Asarams bail application in connection with the rape case against him to September 3
item.itunes:summary: The Gujarat high court adjourned on Thursday the hearing of controversial godman Asarams bail application in connection with the rape case against him to September 3

item.title: Some UPAera appointments shocking to be reviewed soon
item.description: Human resource development minister Smriti Irani termed some of the appointment by the UPA government shocking as they were done overruling recommendations of the search committees
item.itunes:subtitle: Human resource development minister Smriti Irani termed some of the appointment by the UPA government shocking as they were done overruling recommendations of the search committees
item.itunes:summary: Human resource development minister Smriti Irani termed some of the appointment by the UPA government shocking as they were done overruling recommendations of the search committees

item.title: TMC MP in CBI crosshairs for Saradha links
item.description: The CBI is zeroing on top politicians and influential people who took money from Saradha boss Sudipta Sen and is all set to raid the residence of a Trinamool MP
item.itunes:subtitle: The CBI is zeroing on top politicians and influential people who took money from Saradha boss Sudipta Sen and is all set to raid the residence of a Trinamool MP
item.itunes:summary: The CBI is zeroing on top politicians and influential people who took money from Saradha boss Sudipta Sen and is all set to raid the residence of a Trinamool MP

item.title: Amit Shah sets sights on Telangana
item.description: BJP president Amit Shah has set his focus on the south especially Telangana to be a major contributor to the victory of the party in the 2019 elections
item.itunes:subtitle: BJP president Amit Shah has set his focus on the south especially Telangana to be a major contributor to the victory of the party in the 2019 elections
item.itunes:summary: BJP president Amit Shah has set his focus on the south especially Telangana to be a major contributor to the victory of the party in the 2019 elections

item.title: JK Army guns down 10 infiltrators in August as ceasefire violation continues
item.description: With Pakistan repeatedly violating the ceasefire agreement in Jammu and Kashmir despite Prime Minister Narendra Modis warnings the number of infiltrators killed near the LoC has also gone up
item.itunes:subtitle: With Pakistan repeatedly violating the ceasefire agreement in Jammu and Kashmir despite Prime Minister Narendra Modis warnings the number of infiltrators killed near the LoC has also gone up
item.itunes:summary: With Pakistan repeatedly violating the ceasefire agreement in Jammu and Kashmir despite Prime Minister Narendra Modis warnings the number of infiltrators killed near the LoC has also gone up

item.title: Soon foreign bank trip details could be in IT returns
item.description: The first report of the SIT on black money has sought changes in IT return forms whereby taxpayers would be required to give details of their foreign bank accounts or foreign trips undertaken by them
item.itunes:subtitle: The first report of the SIT on black money has sought changes in IT return forms whereby taxpayers would be required to give details of their foreign bank accounts or foreign trips undertaken by them
item.itunes:summary: The first report of the SIT on black money has sought changes in IT return forms whereby taxpayers would be required to give details of their foreign bank accounts or foreign trips undertaken by them

item.title: Ganga cleaning project begins hightech sensors installed to keep tabs
item.description: The sensors will selfmonitor the levels and nature of effluents and pollutants They will send realtime data on discharges from factories to a central server and will automatically send alerts when effluents breach permissible limits
item.itunes:subtitle: The sensors will selfmonitor the levels and nature of effluents and pollutants They will send realtime data on discharges from factories to a central server and will automatically send alerts when effluents breach permissible limits
item.itunes:summary: The sensors will selfmonitor the levels and nature of effluents and pollutants They will send realtime data on discharges from factories to a central server and will automatically send alerts when effluents breach permissible limits

item.title: Ministries to give ideas on alternative plan panel
item.description: A day after Prime Minister Narendra Modi threw open a public debate to suggest the alternative shape of the Plan Panel a missive from the PMO has been sent to different ministries asking for their suggestions on the same
item.itunes:subtitle: A day after Prime Minister Narendra Modi threw open a public debate to suggest the alternative shape of the Plan Panel a missive from the PMO has been sent to different ministries asking for their suggestions on the same
item.itunes:summary: A day after Prime Minister Narendra Modi threw open a public debate to suggest the alternative shape of the Plan Panel a missive from the PMO has been sent to different ministries asking for their suggestions on the same

item.title: HC acquits all 46 accused of Kambalpalli massacre
item.description: A division bench of the Karnataka high court acquitted on Thursday all 46 accused in the Kambalapalli massacre in which seven dalits were burnt alive in broad daylight by an upper caste mob on March 11 2000
